Token.Abstract: This is a collection constants that are used throughout the application or static functions which can used in several places, but do not show any obvious affinity to a class.
This method does a calculation of activity level based on the current heart rate and the patients ages. The result is defined as an ActivityLevel enumeration.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An integer value that correlates with the ActivityLevel enumeration.

Token.Abstract: This method takes the enumeration integer and returns a string value of the activity level.

Parameter.Name: activity
Parameter.Abstract: An integer that is an ActivityLevel enumeration value.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A string representation of the ActivityLevel enumeration.
